reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress perfect for parties and dinner events, with a flattering design that hugs the body and accentuates curves.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, very fitted, slight stretch, but love it!
items.body: Cute dress! Slight stretch, based on how it feels you’d expect it to be stretchy. I’m a size 2/4, 5’8 125lbs. It doesn’t feel too short, though it’s fitted the texture makes me feel more comfortable. The arms are tight, and a bit short, but I have long arms and the tightness isn’t uncomfortable. It doesn’t feel too breathable, but that’s good for a winter dress. No weird smell, seems to be well made. Happy with this purchase! Just wanted to touch on how it fits and feels because the reviews seem to be mixed. Read more
items.author: Jane Mader

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Flattering Dress!
items.body: So beautiful! I absolutely love this velvet dress! I purchased this to take a mini photo shoot here at home and it fit perfectly! I'm looking to get another color or two because these are so easy to wear. Just for contex, I am 5'4" tall and currently 133 lbs. and purchased a size small. I love it! Read more
items.author: Trixia Lassiter

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Used
items.body: This dress is really pretty, fits well and made of good material. My qualm is the dress I received was clearly used. Smelled strongly of perfume and/or fabric softener. I shouldn’t be paying full price for a used dress. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: I was really surprised by the quality and the fit of this dress. 5 stars!! Read more
items.author: K. Osborn

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fits weird.
items.body: Don’t even waste your money. I’m 5’2 115lbs. The sleeves were too short and the dress fits weird. It’s tight in some spots but loose in others. It went down to almost my knees. It is stretchy I will give it that and the style was cute it did match the photos but if you’re around my size even a small won’t do justice Read more
items.author: Taylor

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: The dress is nice and sexy. My only complaint is that the arms are a bit tight I still kept it because it looks nice. I ordered a small and I weigh 121 bra size36 B I'm 5'1 Read more
items.author: Cindy Razo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and great material
items.body: I am 131 pounds and 5”2. I got a size small- the fit was tight and body hugging which is what I wanted for Christmas photos. I could have gone up a size for a looser fit. Red is definitely vibrant and the velvet material is so pretty! I’d say it’s a great dress for the price. Read more
items.author: Kendra Jones

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Material, But Fit and Quality Miss the Mark
items.body: I really wanted to love this velvet long sleeve top because the fabric itself is soft and luxurious to the touch! It has that rich, smooth feel that you expect from velvet. The color is gorgeous and the style is definitely eye-catching, which makes it tempting for a special night out. Unfortunately, the fit was a major issue. The sizing runs small and the cut doesn’t flatter most body types, including mine. It felt tight in awkward areas while loose in others. The construction also seems a bit flimsy; seams didn’t feel very secure, and the fabric can stretch oddly after even brief wear. For a top marketed as “sexy,” it was more frustrating than flattering. Overall, while the material and color are nice, the poor fit and inconsistent quality make this a miss. I can only give it 2 stars because it looks good on the hanger, but in practice, it just didn’t deliver. Read more
items.author: Michelle Kim

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Red, Wine Red, White, Royal Blue, Dark Blue, Nude Pink, Black, Orange, Smoky Gray. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
